DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess impact provider counsel training patient contraceptive behavior satisfaction cluster randomized trial among 10 Planned Parenthood health center .
DOC.detailed_description: This study build upon prior research contraceptive counsel protocol training develop studied partner New York University Planned Parenthood Federation America . This contraceptive counseling protocol inform literature contraceptive behavior , expertise decision communication science , formative qualitative research Planned Parenthood provider patient . Jaccard et al . ( press ) conduct cluster randomize control study counsel intervention 10 Planned Parenthood health center , staff intervention site participate one-day training counsel protocol follow day in-clinic shadowing . Patients enrol on-site contacted follow-up six month 12 month . Results study indicate patient intervention site satisfy contraceptive counseling method choice , one follow-up few gap contraceptive protection , dual method use , less non-use birth control . There significant difference accurate use birth control pill . Planned Parenthood Federation America ( PPFA ) adapt piloted training contraceptive counseling protocol 2016 18 Planned Parenthood affiliate organization across country . This training integrate one-day event also include provider training address barrier access intrauterine device implant . A mixed-methods implementation evaluation conduct assess outcomes staff patient identify challenge implementation . Preliminary finding program pilot year demonstrate positive trend outcome measure , produce lesson learn implementation challenge , provide support new adaptation train program counseling protocol . The previous pilot year evaluation design assess patient satisfaction method choice training , could answer question continue impact outcomes interest . The current study use cluster randomize control design 10 Planned Parenthood health center assess patient outcome . Five health center randomize intervention receive contraceptive counseling training . As control group , five health center conduct usual care . Women enrol onsite health center contact follow-up approximately 30 90 day post-enrollment . Target enrollment 100 woman per site ( 1000 total ) .
DOC.criteria: Females receive contraceptive counsel participate health center . Ability understand write spoken English . NonEnglish speaker
